DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study test new type counseling develop decrease symptom anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa improve health well-being woman eat disorder . At time , effective form treatment anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa cognitive behavioral therapy . However , form treatment lead complete absence symptom 50 % person complete treatment program . In study test effectiveness new form counseling focus identify build personal strength positive view self mean decrease eat disorder symptom improve health . This study involve 150 woman age 18 35 year currently symptoms anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa . To participate study , woman must also : 1 ) pregnant , 2 ) without diagnosable mental disorder , 3 ) currently take medication eat disorder mental disorder symptom , 4 ) ill enough require inpatient treatment eat disorder 5 ) willing refrain seek treatment eat disorder duration study . Each participant participate 20-week treatment program include nutritional counseling medical care . Both form treatment consider American Psychiatric Association essential part treatment eat disorder find help reduce symptom . In addition , participant receive one two type counsel : 1 . Experimental counseling focus build strength positive self-views 2 . Standard counseling help participant identify solve problem believe contribute eat disorder symptom . The type counseling participant receives determine randomly . To determine whether experimental counseling effective , eat disorder symptom , psychological functional health measure treatment begin three time treatment end ( immediately treatment end , 6 12 month later ) . The finding research study expect contribute development effective intervention decrease eat disorder symptom , increase health well-being woman anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Identity : An Eating Disorder Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Anorexia nervosa Subthreshold anorexia nervosa Bulimia nervosa Subthreshold Bulimia nervosa Nonpregnant No prescribe psychotropic medication No concurrent psychiatric treatment No indication inpatient treatment include suicide risk , significant metabolic cardiac complication Willingness refrain seek form ED treatment complete intervention posttreatment data collection protocol Negative lifetime history schizophrenia , DSMIV Axis I psychotic disorder mental retardation Acute chronic medical condition relate ED Any concurrent DSMIV Axis I disorder threshold level
